Extensions/UIView.html#/defaultNibName.name: defaultNibName
Extensions/UIView.html#/defaultNibName.abstract: Returns the default nib name for the receiver which is its class name.

Extensions/UIView.html#/defaultReuseIden.name: defaultReuseIdentifier
Extensions/UIView.html#/defaultReuseIden.abstract: Returns the default reuse identifier for the receiver which is its class name.

Extensions/UIView.html#/firstResponder.name: firstResponder
Extensions/UIView.html#/firstResponder.abstract: Returns the first responder or nil if nothing is currently first responder.

Extensions/UIView.html#/recursiveSubview.name: recursiveSubviews
Extensions/UIView.html#/recursiveSubview.abstract: Returns a list of all the receiver’s subviews, computed recursively.

Extensions/UIView.html#/viewController.name: viewController
Extensions/UIView.html#/viewController.abstract: Returns the receiver’s owning view controller or if it cannot be found.

Extensions/UIView.html#/startShakeAnimat.name: startShakeAnimation(duration:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/startShakeAnimat.abstract: Starts a shake animation that will last duration seconds.

Extensions/UIView.html#/viewOfClass(_:).name: viewOfClass(_:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/viewOfClass(_:).abstract: Returns the first view of class walking up the view hierarchy or nil if one cannot be found.

Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/regist.name: registerSupplementaryViewClass(_:kind:)
Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/regist.abstract: Registers the provided supplementary view class for reuse.

Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/dequeu.name: dequeueReusableCellClass(_:for:)
Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/dequeu.abstract: Dequeues a reusable cell of the provided class.

Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/dequeu.name: dequeueReusableSupplementaryViewClass(_:kind:for:)
Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/dequeu.abstract: Dequeues a reusable supplementary view of the provided class.

Extensions/UIApplication.html#/openSetti.name: openSettings(options:completion:)
Extensions/UIApplication.html#/openSetti.abstract: Open the application specific settings in the Settings app.
